cause.description:
The Hidden Potential Project is a groundbreaking educational program that leads at-risk teenagers to discover & realize their potential in life.


Every young person has a unique potential waiting to be discovered – a doctor, teacher, scientist, artist, world-leader…

Those who are lucky enough to discover and pursue their potential, have the best chance of achieving success, happiness and health in life.

Millions of young people throughout the United States are failing to discover and realize their potential.
In many inner-city schools across the nation:

  • As few as 40% of students graduate
  • African American and Hispanic male students are statistically more likely to go to prison than college
  • Lower-income students who get A’s on standardized tests go to college at the same rate as top-income students who get D’s


Empowering our at-risk youth with the opportunity to discover and realize their potential will play a significant role in solving many of our country’s most pressing socio-economic problems, including: drug-use, crime, school drop-out and depression.

For more information, please see http://www.hiddenpotentialusa.org

1. Everyone has the right to fulfill their potential in life 2. At risk youth in particular have few opportunities to realize their full potential. 3. At-risk youth in particular need mentors and a program that can lead them to fulill their goals and ambitions in life.
